schema.description:
A Promotion Code represents a customer-redeemable code for a coupon. It can be used to
create multiple codes for a single coupon.

active.description: Whether the promotion code is currently active. A promotion code is only active if the coupon is also valid.

code.description: The customer-facing code. Regardless of case, this code must be unique across all active promotion codes for each customer.

created.description: Time at which the object was created. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

expires_at.description: Date at which the promotion code can no longer be redeemed.

livemode.description: Has the value `true` if the object exists in live mode or the value `false` if the object exists in test mode.

max_redemptions.description: Maximum number of times this promotion code can be redeemed.

object.description: String representing the object's type. Objects of the same type share the same value.

first_time_transaction.description: A Boolean indicating if the Promotion Code should only be redeemed for Customers without any successful payments or invoices

minimum_amount.description: Minimum amount required to redeem this Promotion Code into a Coupon (e.g., a purchase must be $100 or more to work).

times_redeemed.description: Number of times this promotion code has been used.

schema.title: PromotionCode
